title: Charles Kennedy – 2005 Speech to Liberal Democrat Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the then Leader of the Liberal Democrats, Charles Kennedy, to the 2005 Liberal Democrat Conference in Blackpool on 22nd September 2005.
content:
